price: 16. »El día en que os inflijamos un gran castigo (el día de la batalla de Badr) os daremos vuestro merecido».
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
